Package Controller

Class DataController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller.DataController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CineplexController, StartUpController
    public abstract class DataController
extends java.lang.Object
implements Controller
    This abstract contains the file paths which store data files This abstract class contains only two methods - to read a serializable object from a file to write a serializable object into a file.

      DataController()

      This method reads a serializble object from a given file name.

    • Method Detail

      • readFile

        public static java.lang.Object readFile​(java.lang.String fileName)
                                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                        java.io.IOException,
                                        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        This method reads a serializble object from a given file name.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the file address to be read
        Returns:
        serializable object read from the file. null if file or class cannot be found
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file cannot be found
        java.io.IOException - if there are errors in file handling
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the class is not found.

      • writeFile

        public static void writeFile​(java.lang.String fileName,
                             java.lang.Object data)
                      throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                             java.io.IOException
        This method writes a serializble object into a given file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the file address to write the data into
        data - the data to be written into the file
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file cannot be found
        java.io.IOException - if there are erors in file handling
